room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: Eleven of us boarded the Titanic and it was so much fun! We survived! We all learned things about ourselves, each other, and walked away on a mission to come back and test our teamwork skills again. Titanic is great for larger groups. The Odyssey staff and the owner, Michael, was amazing! I highly recommend visiting this tucked away gem in Alpharetta.

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We did the Titanic room and we were totally amazed not only at the awesome people who work there, but the authentic props and fun we had figuring out the clues! Totally worth the trip!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: This experience was the best of any I've done so far and I have completed more than 50 escape games.  The music, decor, games/puzzles were top of the line.  The staff and location accommodations far exceeded other such escape game businesses.  I highly recommend Odyssey Escape Game for corporate or family gatherings!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: This was my first escape room experience and it was amazing. The team at Odyssey was so friendly, and you could tell they are passionate at what they do. We took on the Titanic room this trip, the rooms were very detailed, you could tell they took time putting them together. I really liked how they tried to keep everything historically correct, it adds another level to the experience. I'll be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Titanic - The Final Hour" by Odyssey Escape Game in Atlanta
review: We went with a group of about 10 of us and we did the Titanic themed escape room! It was SO much fun! The whole escape room was challenging but not too difficult where you felt like giving up. This was my first escape room and I'm craving to go back and do the prison one and then the other ones as they come out. I'd highly recommend this place!!!
